entry.title: PRESIDENT'S LETTER ON JUL.12, 2017
entry.content:
Dear Sir / Madam:

It gives me great pleasure to invite you to visit Vangelo Footwear at the coming Shoe Shows. Vangelo Footwear has been supplying excellent lines of Men’s, Women’s and Kids’ footwear to retailers for many years. Vangelo will exhibit our Spring/Summer 2018 collections as well as Fall/Winter 2017 in stock collections at a series of the coming shows:

1) Edmonton Footwear & Accessories Buying Mart: Room#2803, Aug.8-10, 2017

Double Tree Hilton West Edmonton, Edmonton, AB

2) Montreal Shoe Show: Room#229, Aug.12-15, 2017

        Quality Suites, 2035 Auto Des Laurentides. Laval, QC

3) Ottawa Shoe Show: Suite#233; Aug.13-14, 2017

       Best Western Plus, 1274 Carling Ave., Ottawa, ON

4) Toronto Mode Accessories Show: Booth#3303 and #3309, Aug.13-15, 2017

International Plaza Hotel, 655 Dixon Road, Toronto, ON

5) Toronto Gift Fair: Booth#12317-Hall12 North Bldg, Aug.13-16, 2017

       Toronto Congress Centre, 650 Dixon Rd., Toronto, ON

6) Toronto Shoe Show: Booth# 631, Aug.20-22, 2017

       Toronto Congress Centre, 650 Dixon Rd., Toronto, ON

7) Midwest Buy Mart: Hall D Booth E-12, Aug.25-28, 2017

         Prairieland Park's Trade Centre Complex, Saskatoon, SK

8) Ottawa Eastern Mac: Suite#521, Aug.26-28, 2017

       Holiday Inn Express, Nepean, ON

9) London Western M.A.C.: Room#181, Aug.30-31, 2017

         Four Points Sheration, London, ON

10) Trends Apparel Show: Hall "F" Booth 520, Sept.7-10, 2017

       Edmonton Expo Centre, Edmonton, AB

11) Dan Oneill Boot Mart: Suite#112, Sept.8-10, 2017

       Days Inn & Suites, Moncton, NB

12) Toronto Profile Show: Booth#W401, Sept.10-13, 2017

       Toronto Congress Centre South Building, 650 Dixon Rd., Toronto, ON

13) Sudbury Northern Mac: Suite#151, Sept.15-17, 2017

       Travel Lodge, Sudbury, ON

14) AFE Fashion Mart: Suite#125-126, Sept.17-19, 2017

       Days Inn & Suites, Moncton, NB

15) AFE Fashion Mart: Cunard Room, Sept.23-26, 2017

       Atlantica Hotel, Halifax, NS

You are our most valued customer! We look forward to meeting you!! We are always here to serve you the best!!!

Tom He

President

Vangelo Footwear

entry.title: PRESIDENT'S LETTER ON JAN.18, 2017
entry.content:
Jan.18th, 2017

Dear Customer,

It gives me great pleasure to invite you to visit Vangelo Footwear at the coming Shoe Shows. Vangelo Footwear has been supplying excellent lines of Men’s, Women’s and Kids’ footwear to retailers for many years. Vangelo will exhibit our Fall/Winter 2017 collections as well as Vangelo’s Spring/Summer 2017 collections in stock at a series of the coming shows:

 

Montreal Boot Show: Room#223; Jan. 28-31, 2017

Quality Suites, 2035 Autoroute Des Laurentides. Laval, QC H7S 1Z6

London Shoe Show: Room#290; Jan. 29-30, 2017

Four Points Sheraton, London, ON

Mode Accessories Show: Booth#3303; Jan. 29-31, 2017

Doubletree International Centre, Toronto, ON

Toronto Gift Fair: HALL#12 North BLDG -Booth#12317; Jan. 29 - Feb. 02, 2017

Toronto Congress Centre, North BLDG, 650 Dixon Rd., Toronto, ON

Edmonton Fall 2017 Footwear Buying Market: Room# 2803; Feb.03-05, 2017

Double Tree Hilton, West Edmonton, AB

Ottawa Boot Show: Suite#200 and #217; Feb.05-06, 2017

Best Western Plus - Ottawa City Centre, Ottawa, ON

Moncton Boot Mart: Room# 112; Feb.11-13, 2017

Days Inn & Suites, Moncton, NB

London Western M.A.C: Room#181; Feb. 15-16, 2017

Four Points Sheraton, London, ON

Midwest Buy Mart: Booth#E-12 Hall D; Feb.25-27, 2017

Prairieland Park's Trade Centre complex, Saskatoon, SK

Ottawa Eastern M.A.C.: Suite#521, Feb.25-27, 2017

Holiday Inn Express, Nepean, ON

Toronto Shoe Show: Booth# 631; Feb.26-28, 2017

Toronto Congress Centre, 650 Dixon Rd., Toronto, ON

AFE Fashion Mart: Room# 125-126; Mar.03-06, 2017

Days Inn & Suites, Moncton, NB

Montreal Shoe Show: Room#229; Mar.04-07, 2017

Quality Suites, 2035 Autoroute Des Laurentides. Laval, QC H7S 1Z6

Trends Apparel Show: Booth#520, Hall F, Mar.05-08, 2017

Edmonton Expo Centre, Edmonton, AB

AFE Fashion Mart: Cunard Room# 215; Mar.10-13, 2017

Atlantica Hotel, Halifax, NS

Sudbury Northern M.A.C.: Suite#151, Mar.24-26, 2017

Travel Lodge, Sudbury, ON

 

You are our most valued customer. We look forward to meeting and serving you the best!

 

Thank you.

Tom He

President

Vangelo Footwear

Tom He
